Name: Headless Statue of Harwa
Description: This statue, which shows a fat man named Harwa, was found headless. Harwa, who owned a huge tomb situated near the temple of Deir el-Bahari, is represented with dangling breasts, a big belly, a rather strange kilt, and both hands by his sides. The kilt and the back of the statue bear some hieroglyphic inscription giving the name and titles of its owner.
